name: C&R Group
description: C&R Group’s history began in 1986 to offer share registry services to the banks’ shareholders, after Barclay's listing in Nairobi Securities Exchange the same year.  The company was renamed Custody & Registrars Services Ltd and remains the market leader in shares registrar’s services, enjoying a majority market share of all listed companies trading at the Nairobi Securities Exchange.
